title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 350.6 - Statistical reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 350.6 - Statistical reports

State Regulations

Every request for assistance or care, including requests
for transfers and reclassifications, shall be recorded and the disposition
statistically reported in accordance with the instructions of the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
350.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
